import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import './header.styles.scss' import {ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../images/header.svg' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {auth} from '../../FireBase/firebase.utils' const headerComponent=({currentUser})=>{ console.log('Current User ',currentUser) return(
Shop Now Contact { currentUser? Sign In :null }
) } const mapStateToProps=(state)=>({ currentUser:state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStateToProps,null)(headerComponent)
